productDetails.warrantyText: All our PCs are covered by a 3-year full warranty in accordance with Finnish consumer protection law.

orderModal.title: How to order üì¶
orderModal.intro: The fastest way to order this PC is to send me a message. The machine can be picked up in Tampere, where you can confirm it is working by running a benchmark. Or, choose premium home delivery - I'll personally bring your PC directly to your door in my own vehicle (price based on distance).
orderModal.availability: ‚è∞ I am available almost 24/7 and will try to reply as soon as possible! Service in Finnish and English.

customBuild.title: Get the exact PC you want
customBuild.intro: Whether you have a clear vision or just a rough idea, I'm here to help. Tell me about your needs: are you looking for silky-smooth 1440p gaming at Ultra settings, competitive esports performance, or a workstation for video editing? Want RGB lights that shine, or a clean stealth build? Prefer a compact PC to fit on your desk, or a full tower with many expansion slots?
customBuild.callToAction: Send me a message and let's have a chat about what you're looking for.
customBuild.benefit1: Your PC built and ready within a week
customBuild.benefit3: Full benchmark testing to ensure peak performance
customBuild.benefit4: Choose pickup in Tampere or premium home delivery to your door
customBuild.availability: ‚è∞ I am available almost 24/7 and will try to reply as soon as possible! Service in Finnish and English.

about.pageSubtitle: Stylish, high-quality PCs from Tampere, Finland

whoIAm.description: I'm a software engineer based in Tampere with a deep passion for building excellent PCs. It must look good on your desk, perform flawlessly, and stand the test of time - something that you are proud to own.

saveTime.title: Save Time and Hassle
saveTime.description: Building a PC can be fun, but it demands hours of research, assembly, software installation, and troubleshooting. Let me handle all of that so you can skip straight to enjoying your new machine.

customerFirst.title: You Come First
customerFirst.description: I take time to understand what you need - whether it's for gaming, work, or creating content. Fast replies via text or email, flexible pickup times, and now premium home delivery for ultimate convenience. That's why customers give me top ratings on Google Maps.

builtToLast.title: Built to Last
builtToLast.description: Only new, quality parts from trusted suppliers - no shortcuts. Every PC runs through full stress tests and stability checks before delivery. Plus, you get a 3-year warranty on every build, following Finnish Consumer Protection Act.

localAdvantage.title: Based in Tampere, Delivering Across Finland
localAdvantage.description: While based in Pirkanmaa region, I serve customers throughout Finland. Choose to meet face-to-face in Tampere with flexible pickup times, or opt for premium home delivery where I personally bring your PC directly to your door - carefully transported in my own vehicle, not by a shipping company. Whether you're in Helsinki, Vaasa, Jyv√§skyl√§, or anywhere in between, your PC arrives safe and ready to use. Support local business with personal service you can trust.

meowStory.title: The Story Behind "Meow"
meowStory.description: A few years ago, I rescued a tiny, spicy basement kitten, who I named Meo. This little guy brought a lot luck and joy during a difficult period of my life. The name "Meow PC Store" is a way for me to remember him, reminding me to bring joy to my customers, just like he did to me.
meowStory.caption: He is now a big, fat cat, living happily with his owner.
